promotional_description: 3pk Slim Fit Easy Iron Long Sleeve Shirts
product_description: This practical and elegant three-pack of men’s slim fit shirts are tapered to be flattering with our excellent Easy to Iron finish for simplicity. Look slick pairing these contemporary shirts under a suit or add a pop of colour with a pocket square. Let this simple and stylish look be your go-to for everyday office wear or formal evening occasions.
